uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique identify of this item independent of the Supplier IDs

ref.title: Ref
ref.description: Primary reference code that identifies this item. Additional codes can be provided in the 'codes' field.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency used for the item's price.

price.title: Price
price.description: Base price of a single unit to be sold.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Code for unit of the item being sold

codes.title: Codes
codes.description: List of additional codes, IDs, or SKUs which can be used to identify the item. The should be agreed upon between supplier and customer.

origin.title: Country of Origin
origin.description: Country code of where this item was from originally.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional meta information that may be useful

Item.description: Item is used to describe a single product or service.

ItemCode.description: ItemCode contains a value and optional type property that means additional codes can be added to an item.
